channel.title: Every single server I've tryed, all failed too connect..wtf?
channel.description:
http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/9839/grdk8.jpg
I read somewhere that you use a .bat file..
I don't see a .bat file? http://img352.imageshack.us/img352/3032/gr1rc9.jpg
The one in moparsacape30? But I can't join a server with that, just basicly get in one, alone..
Come on guys..help out :(

item.title: Every single server I've tryed, all failed too connect..wtf?
item.dc:creator: @fasinating fasinating
item.description:
@fasinating wrote:

Okay, I did the hitmachi and stuff, try too connect too the server, I hit OK, nothing happens

http://img474.imageshack.us/img474/851/uhmkr3.jpg

And sorry, I didn’t know bumping wasn’t allowed [br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 06:13:38 PM[/size][hr]Ah, nevermind, you had too do the ip at the log in screen
Thanks guys

item.title: Every single server I've tryed, all failed too connect..wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

first off the username is what ever u want, u also need Hamachi http://www.hamachi.cc/download/

after u download it u need to click the triangle at the bottem and select join, for network put in escapescape3 and for password ut in escape, now put in a username and pass u want to use and then for ip put 5.53.26.243

and also
and the .bat file is the runMoparScape file, notice how it says ms-dos BATch file

Read full topic

item.title: Every single server I've tryed, all failed too connect..wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

No bumping!!! and wtf how come that post didn’t get merged!?!? GASP!

ANyways, download Moparscape 3.0. That’s probably why you can’t connect. Either that or all the servers are down.
http://moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Enjoy!
